snippet.title: Dream Trigger 3D - N3DS - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Dream Trigger 3D is a completely original arcade shooter where players trigger sonar bombs to expose colorful enemies and then blast them into multicolored 3D patterns to create a first of its kind handheld gaming experience. 
Dream Trigger 3D is designed specifically for the Nintendo 3DS™ system and is played by one or two players in a frenetic combination of color and light mixed with a dynamic multi-track musical score.  

Dream Trigger will be available on Nintendo 3DS only in 2011.
